timeline.message: Added deletion of StudentQuestions at tear down
remove unnecessary rest calls in tests

timeline.bodyText: Can a student edit the answer to a question? If not could you please cover this case.
timeline.author: HanyaElhashemy

replies.bodyText: Good point! Yes, currently everyone can edit the answers. Anyway I added a testcase to cover it, since it makes sense to test with different users.
replies.author: clemenszuck

replies.bodyText:
Students should only be able to edit and delete their own answers. They should NOT be able to edit and delete answers of other users.
Tutors and instructors should be able to edit and delete answers of other users.
Please implement this logic in the tests and let them fail if the server logic is not implemented correctly, then we should fix it!
replies.author: krusche

timeline.bodyText: Can another student edit this student's question?
timeline.author: HanyaElhashemy

replies.bodyText: Same as with the answers, everyone can edit it, but I still added an additional case for it.
replies.author: clemenszuck

replies.bodyText:
Students should only be able to edit and delete their own questions. They should NOT be able to edit and delete questions of other users.
Tutors and instructors should be able to edit and delete questions of other users.
Please implement this logic in the tests and let them fail if the server logic is not implemented correctly, then we should fix it!
replies.author: krusche
